name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling (Chromatic)
description: A medium-sized dragon with an affinity for deserts, characterized by its striking blue scales and sharp features, showcasing the might of dragonkind.
memorable: The wyrmling's potent Lightning Breath can devastate opponents in battle, while its unique movement abilities grant it significant tactical advantages.
goals: To dominate its territory, hunt prey, and establish itself as a formidable presence in the desert.
relations: May be encountered alongside other dragons or desert-dwelling creatures; possibly serves larger dragons.
environment: Typically found in arid, desert environments where it can utilize its special abilities.
strengths: High mobility due to flying and burrowing capabilities; immune to lightning damage; proficient in stealth and survival skills.
weaknesses: Lower resistance to non-lightning elemental attacks makes it vulnerable to various forms of elemental damage.
attacks: Utilizes a powerful bite attack that deals piercing damage plus additional lightning damage, and a devastating Lightning Breath that can affect multiple enemies in a line.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Breath, allowing it to exhale a destructive line of lightning that inflicts heavy damage on a failed saving throw.
senses: Possesses blindsight to detect hidden threats within 10 feet, tremorsense extending 30 feet for awareness of nearby movements.
skills: Proficient in perception and stealth, showcasing its aptitude for both hunting and evasion.
additional_information: Desert Farer ability allows movement through difficult terrain in sandy environments.
Dune Splitter grants advantage on stealth while hidden in sand and gravel.
Pounce ability enables the dragon to knock enemies prone with its charge.
